<h3 id="X18250">X(18250) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 2nd ZANIAH TO 5th CONWAY</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (-a+b+c)*(2*a^3+3*(b+c)*a^2+2*(b+c)^2*a+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c))  :  :
<br>
<b>X(18250) = 3*X(2)+X(12527) = 3*X(210)+X(950) = 3*X(210)-X(6743) = 5*X(1698)-X(4292) = 3*X(3679)+X(10624) = 5*X(3697)+3*X(11113) = 5*X(3876)-X(6737) = 7*X(3983)+X(6284) = X(12573)-5*X(18230)</b>
<p>X(18250) lies on these lines: {1,5129}, {2,3361}, {4,9}, {8,4082}, {20,8580}, {21,6745}, {56,5316}, {63,8582}, {72,6738}, {144,3339}, {188,12580}, {200,452}, {210,950}, {236,12582}, {329,3671}, {341,3883}, {388,7308}, {390,4882}, {405,13405}, {515,5044}, {518,6744}, {519,960}, {527,3812}, {908,5260}, {936,4297}, {938,5223}, {942,5850}, {946,8158}, {958,999}, {993,6700}, {1056,3646}, {1212,5717}, {1329,3634}, {1376,12512}, {1698,4208}, {1722,3663}, {1770,18231}, {1788,3929}, {1837,3715}, {2325,3704}, {2478,4847}, {2886,12571}, {2899,11679}, {3008,13161}, {3059,9844}, {3244,15829}, {3305,3436}, {3333,17559}, {3624,5328}, {3626,5837}, {3679,10624}, {3686,3714}, {3697,11113}, {3820,6684}, {3828,5325}, {3876,6737}, {3983,6284}, {4301,9623}, {4312,11024}, {4315,8583}, {4342,4853}, {4512,7080}, {4538,4662}, {4640,9711}, {4679,12053}, {4915,9785}, {5084,11019}, {5123,18253}, {5231,6919}, {5250,6736}, {5251,13411}, {5261,12573}, {5716,7322}, {5779,9948}, {5785,9799}, {5791,10175}, {6685,16850}, {7028,12581}, {8169,16408}, {12545,18229}, {12579,18235}, {12607,15254}, {17647,18236}</p>
<p>
X(18250) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {8, 12575}, {72, 6738}<br>
X(18250) = complement of X(4298)<br>X(18250) = X(389) of 2nd Zaniah triangle<br>X(18250) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 12527, 4298), (9, 10, 18249), (9, 2551, 10), (10, 5493, 1706), (200, 452, 4314), (210, 950, 6743), (958, 3452, 1125), (1329, 5302, 5745), (1329, 5745, 3634), (1706, 5698, 5493), (5129, 5815, 1), (5273, 8165, 1698)<br></p>
